Name: Sersi
Description: Sersi is a member of the Eternals, a species diverted from humanity by experiments conducted by the Celestials one million years ago.
FirstComicDescription: Sersi and Margot have been captured by the Deviants and are headed to their undersea kingdom of Lemuria!! Eternals Makkari and Thena come to earth to help defend New York from the Deviant attack, but are they too little, too late?
